activities: IDEX receives a variety of types of human resources data embodying personal information and sensitive personal information from its subsidiaries, affiliates and agents in the EU, EEA and Switzerland consisting of electronic and hard copy human resources data in the form of (i) correspondence, (ii) documents for conducting business, and (iii) other human resources data collected and processed within the context of IDEX’s operations.  These human resources data are collected and transferred to the US in support of the company's business activities and operations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)General Science & Technology - (GST)Medical Equipment - (MED)Pumps Valves & Compressors - (PVC)
personaldata: Human resources data (which may be Off-line, On-Line, Manually processed data)
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
